menu_screen:menu_options_list.name: menu_screen:menu_options_list
menu_screen:menu_options_list.description: A list of menu options presented as a Recycler View. Each option includes an icon and a text label, and some options have dividers between them.
menu_screen:menu_options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen, which displays a toolbar with a navigation button and a title indicating 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable area with various settings options including 'Logins and passwords', 'Autofill', 'Accessibility', 'Language', 'Set as default browser', 'Private browsing', 'HTTPS-Only Mode', 'Enhanced Tracking Protection', 'Site permissions', 'Delete browsing data', and 'Delete browsing data on quit'. Each option is represented by a button with a title, and some have a summary.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='mozac_browser_menu_recyclerView' and text()='Bookmarks




History




Downloads




Add-ons




Sync and save data


Manage Account and Devices

Desktop site




What’s new




Help




Customize homepage



Settings']

menu_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <framelayout>
  <framelayout resource_id="mozac_browser_menu_menuView">
   <recyclerview resource_id="mozac_browser_menu_recyclerView">
    <linearlayout>
     <imageview resource_id="image">
     </imageview>
     <button resource_id="text">
     </button>
     <view>
     </view>
    </linearlayout>
    <button resource_id="simple_text">
    </button>
    <view>
    </view>
    <checkbox resource_id="switch_widget">
    </checkbox>
    <button>
     <imageview resource_id="image">
     </imageview>
     <button resource_id="notification_dot">
     </button>
     <button resource_id="highlight_text">
     </button>
     <imageview resource_id="end_image">
     </imageview>
    </button>
   </recyclerview>
  </framelayout>
 </framelayout>
</framelayout>

bookmarks_screen:navigate_up_button.name: bookmarks_screen:navigate_up_button
bookmarks_screen:navigate_up_button.description: A button in the toolbar used to navigate back to the previous screen.
bookmarks_screen:navigate_up_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the home_screen, which contains a top bar with a private browsing button, a search bar, and a tab counter. Below the top bar, there is a scrollable area with session controls, including recent tabs and recently visited sites. The bottom toolbar contains a menu button.

bookmarks_screen:title.description: The title of the toolbar indicating the current screen is 'Bookmarks'.

manage_account_and_devices_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <linearlayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayout resource_id="rootContainer">
      <framelayout resource_id="container">
       <framelayout resource_id="container">
        <framelayout resource_id="gestureLayout">
         <viewgroup resource_id="browserWindow">
          <viewgroup resource_id="browserLayout">
           <viewgroup resource_id="swipeRefresh">
           </viewgroup>
           <viewgroup resource_id="toolbar">
            <viewgroup>
             <linearlayout resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_navigation_actions">
              <button>
              </button>
             </linearlayout>
             <button resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_security_indicator">
             </button>
             <linearlayout resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_origin_view">
              <button resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_url_view">
              </button>
             </linearlayout>
             <linearlayout resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_browser_actions">
              <button>
               <button resource_id="counter_root">
                <button resource_id="counter_box">
                </button>
                <button resource_id="counter_text">
                </button>
               </button>
              </button>
             </linearlayout>
             <framelayout resource_id="mozac_browser_toolbar_menu">
              <button resource_id="icon">
              </button>
             </framelayout>
            </viewgroup>
           </viewgroup>
          </viewgroup>
         </viewgroup>
        </framelayout>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayout>
    </framelayout>
   </linearlayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

personalized_homepage_intro_screen:conte.name: personalized_homepage_intro_screen:content
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:conte.description: The main container for the personalized homepage introduction screen.

personalized_homepage_intro_screen:intro.name: personalized_homepage_intro_screen:intro_message
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:intro.description: A message introducing the personalized homepage, highlighting features such as recent tabs and bookmarks.
xpath: //*[text()='Meet your personalized homepage. Recent tabs, book']
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:intro.element: Meet your personalized homepage. Recent tabs, book

personalized_homepage_intro_screen:dismi.name: personalized_homepage_intro_screen:dismiss_button
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:dismi.description: A button to dismiss the personalized homepage introduction message.
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:dismi.effect: tap to navigate to the home_screen, which contains a top bar with a private browsing button, a search bar, and a tab counter. Below the top bar, there is a scrollable area with session controls, including recent tabs and recently visited sites. The bottom toolbar contains a menu button.

personalized_homepage_intro_screen:actio.name: personalized_homepage_intro_screen:action_button
personalized_homepage_intro_screen:actio.description: A button for an unspecified action on the personalized homepage introduction screen.

settings_screen:navigation_button.name: settings_screen:navigation_button
settings_screen:navigation_button.description: A button used to navigate back from the settings screen.

settings_screen:title.name: settings_screen:title
settings_screen:title.description: The title of the settings screen, indicating 'Settings'.

settings_screen:settings_options_list.name: settings_screen:settings_options_list
settings_screen:settings_options_list.description: A scrollable list of settings options, each represented by a button with a title and some with a summary.
settings_screen:settings_options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the language_screen, which displays a toolbar with a navigation button, a title indicating 'Language', and a search button. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable list of languages. Each language entry includes a button for the language title and a button for the language subtitle.

homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_.name: homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_label
homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_.description: Label indicating the section for setting the opening screen.

options: Homepage after four hours of inactivity
homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_.name: homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_options
homepage_settings_screen:opening_screen_.description: A list of radio buttons for setting the opening screen, including options for Homepage, Last tab, and Homepage after four hours of inactivity.

about_firefox_screen:navigate_up_button.name: about_firefox_screen:navigate_up_button
about_firefox_screen:navigate_up_button.description: A button in the toolbar used to navigate back to the previous screen.
about_firefox_screen:navigate_up_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the settings_screen, which displays a toolbar with a navigation button and a title indicating 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable area with various settings options including 'Logins and passwords', 'Autofill', 'Accessibility', 'Language', 'Set as default browser', 'Private browsing', 'HTTPS-Only Mode', 'Enhanced Tracking Protection', 'Site permissions', 'Delete browsing data', and 'Delete browsing data on quit'. Each option is represented by a button with a title, and some have a summary.

about_firefox_screen:firefox_wordmark_bu.description: A button displaying the Firefox wordmark.

default_apps_screen:navigate_up_button.name: default_apps_screen:navigate_up_button
default_apps_screen:navigate_up_button.description: A button in the toolbar used to navigate back to the previous screen.
default_apps_screen:navigate_up_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the settings_screen, which displays a toolbar with a navigation button and a title indicating 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable area with various settings options.

default_apps_screen:title.name: default_apps_screen:title
default_apps_screen:title.description: The title of the screen indicating 'Default apps'.

default_apps_screen:search_settings_butt.name: default_apps_screen:search_settings_button
default_apps_screen:search_settings_butt.description: A button in the toolbar used to search within the settings.

default_apps_screen:default_app_categori.name: default_apps_screen:default_app_categories_list
default_apps_screen:default_app_categori.description: A scrollable list of default app categories, each represented by a title and a summary.

customize_screen:navigate_up_button.name: customize_screen:navigate_up_button
customize_screen:navigate_up_button.description: A button to navigate up from the Customize screen.

customize_screen:title.name: customize_screen:title
customize_screen:title.description: The title of the Customize screen.

customize_screen:customization_options_l.name: customize_screen:customization_options_list
customize_screen:customization_options_l.description: A scrollable list of customization options including themes, toolbar position, and gesture settings. Each option is represented by a button with a title and a radio button.
customize_screen:customization_options_l.effect: tap to select the Dark theme option within the customization options list.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='recycler_view' and text()='Theme


Light



Dark



Follow device theme

Toolbar


Top



Bottom

Gestures


Pull to refresh

Swipe toolbar sideways to switch tabs']

customize_screen:theme_light_button.name: customize_screen:theme_light_button
customize_screen:theme_light_button.description: A button to select the Light theme option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:theme_dark_button.name: customize_screen:theme_dark_button
customize_screen:theme_dark_button.description: A button to select the Dark theme option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:theme_follow_device_but.name: customize_screen:theme_follow_device_button
customize_screen:theme_follow_device_but.description: A button to select the Follow device theme option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:toolbar_top_button.name: customize_screen:toolbar_top_button
customize_screen:toolbar_top_button.description: A button to select the Top toolbar position option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:toolbar_bottom_button.name: customize_screen:toolbar_bottom_button
customize_screen:toolbar_bottom_button.description: A button to select the Bottom toolbar position option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:gesture_pull_to_refresh.name: customize_screen:gesture_pull_to_refresh_button
customize_screen:gesture_pull_to_refresh.description: A button to select the Pull to refresh gesture option within the customization_options_list.

customize_screen:gesture_scroll_to_hide_.name: customize_screen:gesture_scroll_to_hide_toolbar_button
customize_screen:gesture_scroll_to_hide_.description: A button to select the Scroll to hide toolbar gesture option within the customization_options_list.

 Scroll to hide toolbar
</button>

customize_screen:gesture_swipe_toolbar_s.name: customize_screen:gesture_swipe_toolbar_sideways_button
customize_screen:gesture_swipe_toolbar_s.description: A button to select the Swipe toolbar sideways to switch tabs gesture option within the customization_options_list.
